body.p:
Bedford Ky
Decr 15th 1863
Mr John L Scott
Sir

enclosed you will find our friend W. P. Adcocks petitions to the Governor please to use your influence with the Governor to have them remitted you can Say to his excellency what kind of a man he is ignorant and besides not able to pay the fines, but a good clever law abiding man, provided he knew what was law.
Your early attention to this matter and you will oblige the Sighners of the petitions and Many others More especially Mr Adcock
I will be up in a few days or as soon as I feel able

Trimble County
Prayer Rejected
Tho E Bramlette
